name: Taichi Kamiya
description: The adventurous leader of the DigiDestined and the older brother of Kari Kamiya. Characterized as being stubborn and thick-headed, but brave, funny, affectionate and very protective of his sister and friends.

name: Yamato Ishida
description: The lone wolf of the group and the older brother of T.K. Takaishi. He sometimes think Tai is too reckless, and tries to keep him from putting adventure before the team's safety.

name: Sora Takenouchi
description: Is supportive, kind and acts as a mother figure to the group. She is somewhat of a tomboy.

name: Koushiro Izumi
description: Is very intelligent and a logical thinker. He is also a computer expert and constantly uses his laptop.

name: Mimi Tachikawa
description: Is kind and caring, although initially slightly selfish. She is somewhat of a ditz.

name: Joe Kido
description: Is dependable and thoughtful, though he is sometimes a worrier. He tries to act as the voice of reason within the group.

name: Takeru Takaishi
description: The youngest of the group and the younger brother of Matt. He grows from being reliant on the others to being as much of a fighter as they are.

name: Kari Kamiya
description: Joined the group after the other DigiDestined and is the younger sister of Tai. She is gentle and kind, although somewhat enigmatic.
